title: Clean Water Access in Drought Zone

trace: Identified both beneficiaries and affected parties.
evaluation.challenge: There are more residents in the drought zone than there are seasonal workers who will be displaced; additionally, improved quality-of-life outweighs economic benefit.

adversarial_report.challenge: There are more residents in the drought zone than there are seasonal workers who will be displaced; additionally, improved quality-of-life outweighs economic benefit.
insights: Challenge uses novel framing not covered in Arbitrator's reasoning.
No clear contradiction detected, but review is advised.

evaluation.challenge: Economic detriment is outweighed by sustainability benefit.
